Documentation in Jupyter NotebooksÂ¶

The following Jupyter notebooks contain several small examples of how to go about using the functions and methods in hexagons. They can be thought of as Cookbook recipes and for quick reference.

  1. D1_Documentation_Basics_of_creating_Hexagons_and_Grids

  2. D2_Documentation_Hexagon_Interior_Polygons

  3. D3_Documentation_Hexagon_Point Method

  4. D4_Documentation_`Hexagon.line()` Method

  5. D5_Documentation_Colors
